paper_abstract: Based on the non-standard generalized Boolean functions (GBFs) over Z(4), we propose a new method to convert those functions into the 16-QAM Go lay complementary sequences (CSs). The resultant 16-QAM Go lay CSs have the upper bound of peak-to-mean envelope power ratio (PMEPR) as low as 2. In addition, we obtain multiple 16-QAM Go lay CSs for a given quadrature phase shift keying (QPSK) Go lay CS.
